name: HSP_ACCT_SPAN_HAR
description: This table contains account claim pan codes information from the Hospital Account Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple occurrence span codes can be stored in one hospital account, each code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE_SPAN_C_NAME
columns.description: An occurrence span code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: OCCUR_SPAN_F_DATE
columns.description: The date from which the occurrence span code stored in the hospital account applies.

columns.name: OCCUR_SPAN_T_DATE
columns.description: The date until which the occurrence span code stored in the hospital account applies.
